action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the cupboard, the book in the wardrobe and the broom in the freezer.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a apple, a banana, a freezer, a orange, a refrigerator, a peach and a sandwich. The apple is in the refrigerator. The banana is in the refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The orange is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is closed. The peach is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
action.label: context
